testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​
When User scrolls down
Then User must see top actions links
Scenario: Top Actions - Scroll down the page to view Top Actions
testcase.classname: Scenario: Top Actions - Scroll down the page to view Top Actions

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​
When User view accelerator
Then each top actions must have an icon and label below it
Scenario: Top Actions - links and icons
testcase.classname: Scenario: Top Actions - links and icons

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​​
When User hovers over 'More' menu
Then menu dropdown panel must open showing options
Scenario: Top Actions - “More” menu
Given User on the home page​​​​​
When User hovers over 'More' menu​
Then User clicks option on menu
Then User checks must navigate to appropriate page
Scenario: Top Actions – expanded “More” menu
Given User on the home page​​​​​​
When User hovers over 'More' menu​​
Then User points the mouse away from the dropdown
Then the dropdown panel must close
Scenario: Top Actions – hover over state - “More” menu
testcase.classname: Scenario: Top Actions – hover over state - “More” menu

testcase.name: AcceleratorCN24.story
Given User on the home page​​​​​​​
When User see 3 or more than 3 story slides
Then User clicks on CTA in each slide in the story slide must navigate to appropriate page
Scenario: Carousel Banner - View each story slide
testcase.classname: Scenario: Carousel Banner - View each story slide

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​​​​​​
When Story slide is in view
Then corresponding place dot turn red in color
Scenario: Carousel Banner - Stories auto rotate
testcase.classname: Scenario: Carousel Banner - Stories auto rotate

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​​​​​​​
When User clicks on the left nav arrows
Then slide navigates to previous story
When User clicks on the right nav arrows
Then slide navigates to next story
Scenario: Carousel Banner - Navigate through stories using nav arrows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Carousel Banner - Navigate through stories using nav arrows

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​​​​​​​​
When User hovers over left nav arrows
Then User see the background of the arrow must turn gray
Then User hovers over right nav arrows also
Then User see the background of the arrow must turn Gray
Scenario: Carousel Banner - Nav arrows - Hover over state
testcase.classname: Scenario: Carousel Banner - Nav arrows - Hover over state

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​​​​​​​​​
When User hovers over place dots
Then place dot must turn white in color
Scenario: Carousel Banner - Place dots - Hover over state
testcase.classname: Scenario: Carousel Banner - Place dots - Hover over state

testcase.name: Given User on the home page​​​​​​​​​​​​
When User hovers over CTA button
Then User see the background of the button must turn blue in color
Scenario: Carousel Banner - CTA button - Hover over state
testcase.classname: Scenario: Carousel Banner - CTA button - Hover over state
